Condor/Nightlight::

Nightlight was stuck too by the paralyzing gas, she couldn't 
speak or move.

Condor, was severy injured, the cr wouldn't cure the damage that 
his systems had received... 




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He charges around corners in the base locking on to Kup's 
signal.  He 
> finally arrives in the room where the paralyzing gas had mostly 
dissipated 
> into the air.  He continues to follow the signal to Kup's now 
paralyzed body. 
>  He stops only for a moment to make sure Kup is still alive and 
begins 
> surveying the room for Flicker.  He raises both of his arms to 
show that he 
> meant no harm.  "Flicker, I think we need to have a little talk."
